name: InCant
description:
InCant is a card-based RPG where you play as Serena: a mage who has lost her voice and is unable to cast traditional magic through incantations. Instead you support your party through magical cards used to buff your party members who act of their own volition in combat as you journey in search of the Wish card of old legends. Build your deck and customize the effects of the cards outside of combat to craft the perfect deck, with hundreds of possible combinations!

In addition, immerse yourself into the world of InCant and play with real physical cards that are mapped to your in-game cards as you draw from the real deck to play during combat!

Controls:

  • Esc - Pause game
  • WASD - Directional movement
  • QE - Rotate Camera
  • Tab - Open / Close Party View
Team Tenebrous is: Ayodele Afolabi - UI / FX / 2D Artist Richard Chen - Character / Environmental Artist Keegan Dant - Overworld Programmer Tyler Gentry - Card Customization / Systems Programmer Jay Idema - Computer Vision Programmer / Auxiliary Game Programmer Jimmy Jin - Narrative / Music & SFX Designer Dillon Nagele - UI Programmer / Overworld Designer Leith Reardon - Combat Programmer / Project Manager
